newsitem.title: USA: Littlefield, Adams to be delisted Sept 5.
newsitem.headline: Littlefield, Adams to be delisted Sept 5.

text.p: Littlefield, Adams & Co said Tuesday that it is consenting to removal of its common stock from the American Stock Exchange because it no longer satisfies the exchange's listing requirements.
The company said exchange officials notified it that the last day of trading will be September 5.
Littlefield said that it expects its shares will trade in the over-the-counter market after that,
The company's stock closed Tuesday at 5/8, down 1/8.
